channel.title: Lynx set
channel.description:
Decided to work on a new set because i haven't done any modelling lately, this is what i have so far:
[img]http://puu.sh/62m71.jpg[/img]
I'm not sure if i intend to make it a warrior set or a ranger set, however i could also swing it into a mage set. Right now it looks like it is going toward a ranger set but we'll just see how it pans out. Comments would be great, it would be helpful to know what others want done with it. Thanks guys. :P
Edit:
[img]http://puu.sh/6eFae.jpg[/img]
Edit 2:
[img]http://puu.sh/6o6E3.jpg[/img]
Final Edit:
[img]http://puu.sh/6rcKH.jpg[/img]

Thanks for the comments. :)[/quote]

it is nice man only i got 1 comment on the legs it looks more for a girl then for a man i am talking about the open places on the legs

item.title: Lynx set
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Updated.

I’m currently working on the leg design, i’ve gone for a half and full side because of the the chest design (this isn’t finished) and i’ve also tried experimenting with other knee designs and a few “ranger” accessories. With this i’m thinking about adding a little pouch along the side where it is blank or a sheath.

Read full topic

item.title: Lynx set
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:10, topic:537768”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=656593.msg4393908#msg4393908 date=1388508523]
I use a 614 male model for most of my models as i find i’m able to manipulate more effectively with it rather then the 317 model.
[/quote]

lol , no doubt.

off topic: I’v always wanted to know how do runescape’s models have like HD faces in the 508+ revs do they use textures?[/quote]
They use textures but like Amy said they are just applied to the colours. I forget what it is called haha. But basically instead of being just blue it will be blue with a grainy texture. The reason there’s not a lot of textures in rs is because the way they optimized the engine it actually takes longer to load textures than more polygons.

Read full topic

item.title: Lynx set
item.dc:creator: @Ziva Ziva
item.description:
@Ziva wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:13, topic:537768”]I’ve been working on the chest a bit, i’ve taken Ziva’s idea into account but applied it in a different way. I’ve more work to do on the right arm and then i’ll probably start working on the legs etc, any feed back would be appreciated.

Just in case you were wondering about the black part on the wrist of the left arm, i’m trying to balance out the strap but that part isn’t permanent.[/quote]
nice done, only thing i think is that there need to be added something more to the body. like accessoires ( daggers, pouches, darts, idk anything you could think of, it looks to plane atm or some details to the body ( like torva have ) )

Read full topic

item.title: Lynx set
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I’ve been working on the chest a bit, i’ve taken Ziva’s idea into account but applied it in a different way. I’ve more work to do on the right arm and then i’ll probably start working on the legs etc, any feed back would be appreciated.

Just in case you were wondering about the black part on the wrist of the left arm, i’m trying to balance out the strap but that part isn’t permanent.

Read full topic

item.title: Lynx set
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Textures are applied through their colours i believe, if you look closely at the models you’ll notice they’ve patterns that aren’t created with the faces. For example their flannel shirts, they texture in the squares instead of modelling the squares on. This is what i’ve observed but it isn’t for sure.

The only reason we don’t have textures in RSPS is because of Datmaker not allowing it, or else i’d assume all models would be textured.

Read full topic

item.title: Lynx set
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Ziva, post:2, topic:537768”]nice amy u should make the body like this

, so it can be like mage range ( the belt is for a quiver on the back or a staff or whatever u could think of )

edit: its just a sketch :P[/quote]

Frell:

Amy osrs has a job opening at jagex for art for future osrs updates. You’ve pretty much mastered the style

I haven’t seen anything about it? Would you be able to provide a link?
